description: nova.db.fixed_ip_get_all_by_instance_host was removed in commit bb867ce3948ddc23cf928ca3dda100a1a977896a, but is still used in nova-manage. We need to fix this, as it affects listing Fixed Ips for a specific host.
title: nova-manage uses nova.db.fixed_ip_get_all_by_instance_host, which no longer exists

comments.content: nova.db.fixed_ip_get_all_by_instance_host was removed in commit bb867ce3948ddc23cf928ca3dda100a1a977896a, but is still used in nova-manage. We need to fix this, as it affects listing Fixed Ips for a specific host.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mikal

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/25979
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: I missed that this was broken in _2012_ not 2013. Not critical.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mikal

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/25979
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/5cced7a31482d014fe31f815f38fd00e079cc491
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 5cced7a31482d014fe31f815f38fd00e079cc491
Author: Michael Still <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Apr 3 16:22:12 2013 +1100

    Allow listing fixed_ips for a given compute host.
    
    nova.db.fixed_ip_get_all_by_instance_host was removed in commit
    bb867ce3948ddc23cf928ca3dda100a1a977896a, but was still used in
    nova-manage. This patch works around the removal of the foreign
    key that led to this method being removed.
    
    Resolves bug 1163660.
    
    Change-Id: Ieccd37c752e245558827615c098604d11ad3d945
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: stable/grizzly
Review: https://review.openstack.org/27617
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit 141107fdbb8e8d17dd1e4112bdc064d33561dd2f
Author: Michael Still <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Apr 3 16:22:12 2013 +1100

    Allow listing fixed_ips for a given compute host.
    
    nova.db.fixed_ip_get_all_by_instance_host was removed in commit
    bb867ce3948ddc23cf928ca3dda100a1a977896a, but was still used in
    nova-manage. This patch works around the removal of the foreign
    key that led to this method being removed.
    
    Resolves bug 1163660.
    
    Change-Id: Ieccd37c752e245558827615c098604d11ad3d945
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
